member.name: T:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Interfaces.IObjectManager
member.summary: IObjectManager interface exposes methods on the Relativity Object Manager web service used for querying as well as reading and updating fields on Documents and Relativity Dynamic Objects (RDOs).

member.name: M:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Interfaces.IObjectManager.QueryAsync(System.Int32,Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.QueryRequest,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for Workspaces, Documents, RDOs, and system types.
member.param: Workspace ID of the workspace containing the artifacts to query for. Pass -1 for admin artifacts.
A object containing conditions, sorting order, fields, and other information for the query.
Index of the first artifact in the returned object.
Number of items to return in the query result, starting with index in the start parameter.
member.returns: Returns the results of the executed query.
member.remarks: The QueryAsync() methods support querying for the following system types: Application, Batch, Batch Sets, Choice, Client, Group, Markup Set, User, Object Type, Tab, Folder, Layout, View, Workspace, Error, Field, Relativity Script, and Saved Search.

member.name: T:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateByCriteriaRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to perform a mass update operation on all Documents or Relativity Dynamic Objects (RDOs) that meet a specified set of conditions.
member.remarks: The MassUpdateByCriteriaRequest class specifies the view or search conditions used to select a list of objects with the same type for updating. It also specifies same value for a specific field that is to be updated on the objects. In the Relativity UI, this update operation is equivalent to the user selecting the All option in the mass operations bar on a list page.

member.name: P:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateByCriteriaRequest.FieldValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the fields and values used for updating each object. The same value is used for updating a specific field on each object.

member.name: P:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateByCriteriaRequest.ObjectIdentificationCriteria
member.summary: Gets or sets specific view or search conditions used to select the objects for updating.

member.name: T:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateByObjectIdentifiersRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to perform a mass update operation on a list of Documents or Relativity Dynamic Objects (RDOs) by modifying each of the specified object fields with the same value.
member.remarks: The MassUpdateByObjectIdentifiersRequest class specifies the identifiers used to select a list of objects with the same type for updating. It also includes the same values for all object fields that are to be updated. In the Relativity UI, this update operation is equivalent to the user selecting the Checked or These option in the mass operations bar on a list page.

member.name: P:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateByObjectIdentifiersRequest.Objects
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of objects to be updated.

member.name: P:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateByObjectIdentifiersRequest.FieldValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the fields and values used for updating each object. The same value is used for updating all object fields that are to be updated.

member.name: P:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdateOptions.UpdateBehavior
member.summary: Gets or set the behavior used when mass updating multiple choice and multiple object fields by replacing or merging values. By default, values are replaced.

member.name: T:Relativity.ObjectManager.V1.Models.MassUpdatePerObjectsRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to perform a mass update operation on a list of Documents or Relativity Dynamic Objects (RDOs) by modifying each of the specified object fields with a distinct value.
member.remarks: The MassUpdatePerObjectsRequest class specifies identifiers for a list of objects of the same type for updating. It also specifies a distinct value for each object field that is to be updated. This action is like overlay behavior available through the Relativity Desktop Client (RDC).
